name: In the speed of light
description:
In the speed of light, is a small hardcore speedrunning platformer, highly inspired by the end is nigh, for those who like challenges

There are 20 levels, a timer, a death counter, and your time and number of deaths will be displayed at the end.

You are a blob thing, that can change colors from black to white and from white to black. 

If you're black, you can't touch the white blocks

If you're white, you can't touch the black blocks

Controls: Keyboard arrows: move and jump

Spacebar: change colors

Each level has been carefully made for the best possible fun of the players

If enough people play and enjoy the game, I will make a downloable version that will include highscore saved

Creator's best time: 2:03:38
